DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to analyze income variables in Chronic Fatigue Syndrome/Myalgic Encephalomyelitis, and to analyze the effect of short vs. long Cognitive Behaviour Therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Survey and Cognitive Behavior Therapy for Chronic Fatigue Syndrome/Myalgic Encephalomyelitis
DOC.criteria: Patients referred to St.Olav Hospital, Trondheim fulfil the FUKUDA criteria for CFS/ME. Pregnant patients
